title: Weir Farm National Historic Site: Calendar
body: Explore This Park    Plan Your Visit     Calendar            Calendar           Keyword       By Date     Start Date      End Date          Search         Upcoming Events    Showing 3 results    Show ALL instances of recurring events   RSS Feed      Weir Farm National Historic Site "Poetry and Painting" Tour - Bonnie Tremante       Time: 11:00 AM to 12:00 PM Location: Weir Farm NHS  Fees: None     Sunday, August 14, 2016 Registration is free, but space is limited to fifteen participants, so please call early to secure a spot! View Details      Weir Farm National Historic Site Sunset to Moonlight: Night Plein Air Painting      Location: Weir Farm NHS Burlingham Barn Fees: None     Saturday, August 20, 2016 In this workshop, you will explore the on-site plein-air experience of landscape painting at night under the moonlight.
